EmailTemplate.description: Template sent out when a DAK or EReprint is Closed
EmailTemplate.name: HEAT Ready
EmailTemplate.subject: Subject: Your Five Star Professional {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Name__c} is Ready
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.PrimaryRecipient__c},
Your {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Name__c} product is ready! To access it, log in to your account on our website.
To log on, go to fivestarprofessional.com/login
Username: {!Fulfillment__c.Web_Username__c} Password: {!Contact.Login_Code__c}
NOTE: if you've already set your password, use that rather than this login code
Go to My Orders on the right side of your Five Star account and look for "Five Star Monthly HEAT Index." If you don't see it right away, click the grey bar at the bottom that says "To view your complete list of orders click here!" Click "view" to view and download your HEAT Index to share with your clients. By doing this, you'll display your market knowledge and stand out from the competition.
If you don't see your picture on your customized HEAT Index, be sure to upload one to your Five Star Professional profile so it appears on next month's HEAT Index.
Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions â€“ my email address and phone number are below.
Thank you,
{!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner__c} Client Services Coordinator Five Star Professional {!Fulfillment__c.CSR_Phone_Number__c} {!Fulfillment__c.CSR_Email__c}
